caption.p: The HPTLC chromatogram of the crude methanolic of detergent plants after derivatized viewed under UV 366 nm. Track 1 = standard Diosgenin, 2 = standard Quillaja saponin, 3 and 4 = Callus of Litsea extracts, 5 = Sapindus extract, 6 = Acacia extract, 7 = Litsea extract. The symbol (+) indicate the presence of bands on each track.
